sentences: Arst kontrollis tema sinusid röntgeni abil.
context: In Estonian, 'sinus' refers to the anatomical paranasal sinuses - air-filled cavities in the skull near the nasal cavity. It can be used when discussing medical conditions like sinus infections (sinusiit), sinus pain, or examination of the sinuses. The word is borrowed from Latin and maintains its anatomical meaning in Estonian medical terminology.
